title: Ferritin adsorption onto chrysotile asbestos fibers influences the protein secondary structure
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Martina Zangari, Federica Piccirilli, Lisa Vaccari, Cristian Radu, Paola Zacchi, Annalisa Bernareggi, Sara Leone, Giuliano Zabucchi, Violetta Borelli
